page.title: MitchTech Enhanced Money Transfer
page.descr: Texts for enhanced money transfer mod.
page.t: Invalid entry - the text box must contain digits 0-9 and 'm', 'M', 'k' or 'K' - e.g. 12345 200k or 30M
Non-valid transaction: account must be set to zero or positive amount
Non-valid transaction: not enough money in player and manager accounts to set this amount
Valid transaction: click OK to complete or Cancel to discard
